snippet.title: The Fall Part 2: Unbound - Meet the Companion
snippet.description:
Out now!

The Fall Part 2: Unbound follows the adventures of ARID, a sentient AI that seizes control over three playable hosts: A Universal Companion, a reality-divorced Butler, and a mysterious combat drone known as "One". 

This trailer highlights the Companion as ARID's morally questionable protocol causes her hosts to struggle with issues of subservience, survival, and existential crisis.

Steam users can add us to their wishlists at:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/510490/The_Fall_Part_2_Unbound/

Web: http://www.overthemoongames.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/overthemoongms
FB: http://www.facebook.com/overthemoongames
